messages.title: UK General Election, 12th December
messages.content:
There can be no doubt that this election will define our future.
The Tories want to drag us out of the EU against our will and leave Aberdeen, and Scotland, at the mercy of Boris Johnson.
We know that Brexit will hit Aberdeen harder than any other city in the UK and that the NHS will be on Donald Trump's negotiating table.
We can choose a better future.
A future where our city, and country, thrives as a vibrant member of the EU.
A future where we capitalise on our oil and gas skills and realise our renewables potential.
A future where we welcome those who want to work in our schools, NHS and universities.
If elected as your SNP MP, I promise to fight to make this possible.
It’s time to show the Tories the door and ensure Scotland's future is in Scotland's hands.
Only the SNP can beat the Tories in Aberdeen South and we can only do so with your support.
Vote SNP on the 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight against being dragged out of the EU against our will.
Prevent the NHS from being on Donald Trump's negotiating table.
Capitalize on oil and gas skills and realize renewable potential.
Welcome those who want to work in our schools, NHS, and universities.
Ensure Scotland's future is in Scotland's hands.
